long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website Content Blocker - Protect Your Online Experience
A lightweight browser extension that helps you control your web browsing through keyword and URL-based content blocking.

Core Features:

Content-Based Blocking: Block websites that contain specific keywords in their content or URLs

Dual Filtering System:

Word Filtering: Block pages containing specific words in their content
URL Filtering: Block specific domains or URLs using exact matches or wildcards (*)


Real-Time Monitoring: Continuously checks page content as it loads
Password Protection: Secure your blocking settings with a password


Easy Management Interface:

Add Filter Tab: Quickly add new words or URLs to block
List View Tab: Easily manage your blocked content with a clear overview
One-Click Removal: Remove individual items or clear all at once



How It Works:

Add words or URLs you want to block
The extension automatically checks every webpage against your block list
If blocked content is detected, the page is replaced with a block screen
Use the recheck button to verify pages after making changes

Technical Features:

Pattern Matching: Support for wildcard (*) in URL blocking
Efficient Caching: Smart content caching for better performance
SPA Support: Works with modern single-page applications
Cross-Browser Compatibility: Works on Chrome, Firefox, and Edge

Simple Setup:

Click the extension icon to open the interface
Add keywords or URLs in the 'Add Content' tab
View and manage your blocked items in the 'View List' tab
Use the recheck button to apply changes to the current page

Note: Please refresh the page after removing blocking rules to see the changes.
This is version 1.0.1, focused on core content blocking functionality.
